channel.title: Virtual Scape Development Team
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I would like to introduce a new site! and along with this site we need a server! So, If you would like to help this site in making the server, here is what we need.
[url=http://www.virtual-blood.net]www.virtual-blood.net[/url]
=========== Forum Staff - WILL BE MODS UNTILL YOU PROVE YOURSELF, THEN WE WILL PICK ADMINS, YOU MUST HAVE PROOF THAT YOU WAS A MOD ON OTHER FORUMS AND I MUST LOOK AT IT - Full at the moment =========== 1. Tacoboyy 2. Mod Robby 3. cumescape 4. viruz 3 5.
=========== Coders - =========== 1. I Metal I 2. kenny2125
=========== Server Hoster - MUST BE ATLEAST 20/7 - NO-IP - =========== 1. 2. 3.
=========== Tester =========== 1. viruz 3 2. mrmad1 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10.
=========== Client Coders + Webclient =========== 1. 2. 3.
=========== Graphic's - =========== 1. Wicked Destiny 2.
================ ====LAYOUT====== ================ [code] Forum Name: Position Applying for: Expierences: Proof: Why should i choose you: How can i contact you: [/code]
=========== Server Features ===========
Well, I was looking to have something like Real runescape ( all stats working etc. ) No Commands except helpful ones A unique starting area that has never been used before ( i dont know one yet ) Something like Pk-Isle and AyudaScape v3
I need suggestions. Contact me, Or, register on [url=http://www.virtual-blood.net]www.virtual-blood.net[/url]
The website is: [url=http://www.virtual-blood.net]www.virtual-blood.net[/url]
You can contact me by: Phr.ee.zex@hotmail.com
You can contact the site owner by: titch_da_midget@hotmail.co.uk
Remember, Go register on our Forums!!! [url=http://www.virtual-blood.net]www.virtual-blood.net[/url]
=================== Requirements for Hosting =================== -24/7 Online Time -No Lag - 130+ people -Must be a hosting pc -Must be a way so www.virtual-blood.net can control the server

item.description:
@xx_ch4d_xx wrote:

Forum Name:Tacoboyy
Position Applying for:Forum staff
Expierences: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,147921.0.html
I was on more just i got a new comp and i forgot links.
Why should i choose you:Cause real easy to get along with and trustworthy
How can i contact you: MSN:Tacoboyy@hotmail.com
[/quote]

How is that experience?

It just shows your signing up for another dev. team…[/quote]

he is accepted, because he was on other dev teams and i know his work.

Read full topic
